title: Did you have to enlist to get mystery champ/skin?
body: I was playing a billion ARAM games with my brother. I presumed it was done automatically and thought the green ticks meant 'battles' that I had participated in...So basically if I didn't enlist will I not get a mystery skin (I have all champs). Also whats the point of making people 'enlist'.

replies.body:
Yeah you will want to check the Ocean Week tab in-client or http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/oceanweek2016/

to see how many points you contributed.
Yeah you need to enlist first and to get the points.
